column2: ?                       Interact with the customer to assess their monthly demand and confirm the delivery schedule to customer after discussing with internal stake holder such production, procurement etc.,                      Actively do stakeholder management with interface partners and passing on all the relevant information, to keep themselves and others informed and create an optimum logistics chain.                     Organize the preparedness of delivery in accordance with delivery priorities and agreements for dispatch, to design dispatch plans in the optimum way and meet customer requirements.                     Enters customer orders in the ERP system and determines the delivery dates (technical clarification, commercial clarification incl. creditworthiness, export control checks, checking of delivery dates and confirmation, order confirmation to the customer) to fulfill the customer order at the requested date.                     Creates or prepares all documents needed for dispatch considering laws and regulations, to ensure a timely and cost-efficient delivery.                     Monitors order related compliance of the delivery dates and quantities to initiate proactive measures for optimizing delivery reliability in good time and to be always capable to provide [order] information.                     (Enters and) maintains processing logistics data, in order to make the flow of goods and values secure and efficient.                  Qualifications and Experience                         Graduate preferably master s in supply chain/Logistics.                     Graduate Minimum 5-7 years and master s 3-5 Yrs. Supply Chain/logistics experience.                     Must have advanced excel skills.                     Must have experience in Logistics environment.                     Must have Export/ import knowledge.                     Expertise within SAP.                     Experience within Healthcare industry is an advantage.
column11: Procurement, Supply chain, Order management, SAP, Diagnostics, Export import, Healthcare, Advanced Excel, Stakeholder management, Logistics
